title: Coventry's Triple Access Saver easy-access account now offers a top 1.46%
text:
Coventry BS's new top-paying easy-access account has knocked Goldman Sachs' Marcus off the top of the best buy tables

Coventry BS's new top-paying easy-access account at 1.46 per cent is available online, by post or in its branches.

Its new Triple Access Saver has knocked the Marcus by Goldman Sachs account from the top spot.

The Coventry account limits you to three withdrawals a year and includes a 0.31 percentage point bonus payable until March 31, 2021.

The online Marcus account pays 1.45 per cent including a 0.1-point bonus for 12 months with no withdrawal restrictions.

Saga's new Easy Access account at 1.4 per cent includes a 12-month bonus of 0.25 points.

Available online or by phone — but you still need an email address to open it.
description: The Coventry account has knocked the Marcus by Goldman Sachs account from the top spot. It limits you to three withdrawals a year and includes a 0.31 percentage point bonus.
authors: Money Mail Reporter For The Daily Mail
